main.name: Asad Memon
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe React
main.bio: My Name is Asad Aslam Memon, I am currently pursuing my bachelors of engineering from Mumbai University and specializing in INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY . I Love to code and create solutions to the real world problems. I am a Full Stack MERN & PHP developer. I cloned Netflix, Instagram, Imessage, Tiktok, Tinder and lot more real world projects. I worked as an intern in web development startup and I created an admin panel to manage the full ecommerce website for their client. I am currently learning advance Full stack stuffs like DevOps and cloud and also mobile development using React Native. I love to teach people about the computer programming and technologies and would love to connect and share my skills & knowledge with anybody who is interested!
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me for online mentoring & Full stack development related stuffs

education.description: One of the pro developer in the college.

work.title: Own Boss
work.description: Cloning all the apps possible. On the way to clone the world! I want to solve all the problems existing in the world through my coding skills!

testimonials.text: Sonny is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Sonny has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
